title: TOWIE's Demi Sims flashes her taut stomach in a crop top as she enjoys night out with Chloe Brockett
text:
They have both suffered heartache in recent months as their relationships ended acrimoniously.

Yet Demi Sims and Chloe Brockett cast aside their romantic woes as they enjoyed a night out on the town at Menagerie in Manchester on Sunday.

The TOWIE stars, aged 23 and 18 respectively, seemed to be in high spirits as they strolled down the road hand in hand.

Delightful duo: Demi Sims and Chloe Brockett cast aside their romantic woes as they enjoyed a night out on the town at Menagerie in Manchester on Sunday

Demi looked effortlessly chic for the outing as she flashed her taut stomach in a black crop top that she teamed with a pair of distressed boyfriend jeans.

The blonde bombshell paid homage to the Nineties by slipping into a pair of perspex Versace mules and rocking double denim.

Chloe was also dressed to impress as she slipped her curves into a wet look catsuit layered beneath an eye catching fur coat.

Ladies night: The TOWIE stars, aged 23 and 18 respectively, seemed to be in high spirits as they strolled down the road hand in hand

Top of the crops: Demi looked effortlessly chic for the outing as she flashed her taut stomach in a black crop top that she teamed with a pair of distressed boyfriend jeans

The girls no doubt had plenty to catch up on after being subject to heartache recently.

Demi's outing comes after her ex Megan Barton Hanson admitted her new relationship got off to an inauspicious start after Demi discovered they had exchanged messages on social media while they were still dating.

Speaking to the latest issue of new, the Love Islander claimed Demi - who she briefly romanced while filming Celebs Go Dating - confronted her after realizing she was in contact with Chelcee Grimes.

Low-key glamour: The blonde bombshell paid homage to the Nineties by slipping into a pair of perspex Versace mules and rocking double denim

Turning heads: Chloe was also dressed to impress as she slipped her curves into a wet look catsuit layered beneath an eye catching fur coat

'After the Celebs Go Dating finale party, Chelcee slid into my DMs,' she explained.

'She said I seemed really nice and wanted to take me out, but I told her I was seeing someone. I'm such a loyal person and didn't ever want to put Demi in that situation.

'Demi clocked that I was following Chelcee on Instagram and went mad.

'I showed her the messages and she just kicked off about them, so we drew a line under it. About a week later, I started seeing Chelcee.'

Meanwhile, Chloe was dating TOWIE co-star Harry Lee but things ended on a sour note and he has since begun pursuing Demi's younger sister, Frankie Sims.
